item.title: azure: Retirement: "Send data to Event Hubs & Storage (Preview)" retiring July 31, 2026
item.description:
Microsoft will retire the preview feature “Send virtual machine client data to Event Hubs and Storage (Preview)” on July 31, 2026. After that date the feature will no longer be supported and you will not be able to create new data collection rules that use it.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure SQL change event streaming
item.description:
Azure SQL now supports Change Event Streaming (CES) in public preview, allowing near‑real‑time streaming of data changes from Azure SQL Database directly into Azure Event Hubs. The feature is designed to simplify data integration and enable event‑driven architectures and enhanced analytics by delivering change events with low latency.

  • Source: Azure Updates
